ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors thank Emanuela Foni (Istituto Zooprofilattico Sperimentale della Lombardia e dell’Emilia Romagna, Italy) and Mariette Ducatez (Institut National de la Recherche Agronomique (INRA) and Ecole Nationale Vétérinaire de Toulouse (INP-ENVT), France) for kindly providing hyperimmune serum samples.
